info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 16 at 3:58PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Madison County through 430 PM EDT... At 358 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles north of Marshall, or 6 miles northeast of Hot Springs, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Marshall, Mars Hill, Hot Springs, Faust, Allenstand, Walnut and Wolf Ridge. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
